member.name: T:Rfc1006LibNet.Advanced.Licenser
member.summary: Defines mechanism required to register the whole RFC 1006 LIB .NET.
member.remarks: It is recommended to set the in the main entry point of the application. If there is no entry point available set the property before the first use of the assembly.

member.summary: Gets the license conditions used for RFC 1006 development.
member.value: An instance representing the license conditions for RFC 1006 development.

member.summary: Gets or sets the license key used to license this product.

member.summary: Emits an error message upon expired license conditions.

member.summary: Emits an error message upon expired support license conditions.

member.summary: Emits an error message upon non-productive license conditions.

member.summary: Throws an exception in case of an expired license.

member.summary: Throws an exception in case of a supported expired license.

member.name: T:Rfc1006LibNet.Advanced.ILicenseInfo
member.summary: Provides the license conditions of a single license.

member.name: P:Rfc1006LibNet.Advanced.ILicenseInfo.ExpiryDate
member.summary: Gets the date after which the license expires.
member.value: The after which the license expires or a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) in the case there the license never expires.

member.name: P:Rfc1006LibNet.Advanced.ILicenseInfo.SupportExpiryDate
member.summary: Gets the date until that the license is supported by newer versions of the product.
member.value: The that the license is supported by newer versions of the product or a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) in the case there the license support is unlimited.

member.name: P:Rfc1006LibNet.Advanced.ILicenseInfo.IsEvaluation
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the license can be used for evaluation purpose.
member.value: The value true if the license can be used for evaluation purpose; otherwise the value false.

member.name: P:Rfc1006LibNet.Advanced.ILicenseInfo.IsExpired
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the license is expired and is therefore not longer valid.
member.value: The value true if the license is expired and is therefore not longer valid; otherwise the value false.

member.name: P:Rfc1006LibNet.Advanced.ILicenseInfo.IsSupportExpired
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the support for this product release is expired.
member.value: The value true if the license support for this product release is expired; otherwise the value false.

member.name: P:Rfc1006LibNet.Advanced.ILicenseInfo.Type
member.summary: Gets type of license represented.
member.value: An instance representing the type of license.

member.name: T:Rfc1006LibNet.Advanced.ILicenseType
member.summary: Provides information about the kind of license that activates according features in the product, depending on the type.
